availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Illinois native. Son of Jacob Garman. Married to Frances Garman. Farmer in Warren County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 106. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 79. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Elk Springs, p. 31. Find A Grave, "Blackstone M. Garman (October 18, 1830-December 15, 1904), Memorial #54817036, http://findagrave.com/memorial/54817036 (accessed on February 9, 2018).
